attributes.action: Recognise Capt Thomas Moore in the Queens Birthday Honours
attributes.additional_details: I feel this guy needs all the recognition and more .
attributes.background: Please show support for Captain Thomas Moore , who set out to raise £1000 for the NHS during the corona virus crisis . Currently on 15.4.2020 he’s raised over £5,000,000 . Absolute selfless thought that needs acknowledgement

rejection.details:
In any case, we can't publish petitions calling for people to receive an honour. You can find out more about the honours process and how to nominate someone at

www.gov.uk/honours
